nodes.text: Talonbane Cobra was a starfighter pilot and assassin who flew with the space forces of Black Sun during the Galactic Civil War. Circa 1 ABY, he flew a Kihraxz assault fighter and had earned the title of ace. During the Battle of Tansarii Point Station, Cobra was killed in the Lurid Aurora Nebula by Laetin A'shera's forces working for the Car'das organization.
